snippet: Cherche Midi may be Keith McNally’s most thorough repudiation of the downtown scene and current dining trends of the six restaurants he operates.
abstract: Pete Wells reviews Keith McNally's restaurant Cherche Midi in NoLita section of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Cherche Midi may be Keith McNally’s most thorough repudiation of the downtown scene and current dining trends of the six restaurants he operates.

headline.seo: Restaurant Review: Keith McNally’s Cherche Midi
headline.main: An Impresario Shines His Light on the Customer
